options.title: -m, --mode=MODE
options.description: set file permission bits to MODE, not a=rw - umask

options.title: -m, --mode=MODE
options.description: set file permission bits to MODE, not a=rw - umask

options.title: -Z
options.description: set the SELinux security context to default type

options.title: --context[=CTX]
options.description: like -Z, or if CTX is specified then set the SELinux or SMACK security context to CTX
